REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1855 reute d f BC-GULL-<GLL>-IN-PRIVATE 03-31 0061

TEXT.TITLE: GULL <GLL> IN PRIVATE SALE OF NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Gull Inc said it sold 20 mln dlrs of senior notes due March 31, 1999, to two institutional investors through Oppenheimer and Co. Proceeds will be used to reduce long term debt and to convert other debt to fixed from floating rates, the maker of high technology instruments and other products said. Reuter
